panel.label: Notices
panel.name: notices_tab
panel.panel.string: Notices let you send a message and an optionally attached item. Notices only go to group members in Roles with the ability to receive Notices. You can turn off Notices on the General tab.
panel.text: Notices are kept for 14 days. Maximum 200 per group daily

panel.label: Create New Notice
panel.name: panel_create_new_notice
panel.text: Drag and drop item here to attach it:

group_drop_target.name: drop_target
group_drop_target.tool_tip: Drag an inventory item onto this target box to send it with this notice. You must have permission to copy and transfer the item in order to attach it.

panel.label: View Past Notice
panel.name: panel_view_past_notice
panel.text: To send a new notice, click the + button
